resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Extract Text
options.description: Extract text from document using OCR

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

model.name: model
model.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

documentType.name: documentType
documentType.description: The type of document to process
documentType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

inputType.name: inputType
inputType.description: How the document will be provided
inputType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: Name of the input binary field that contains the file to process
binaryProperty.hint: Uploaded document files must not exceed 50 MB in size and should be no longer than 1,000 pages.
binaryProperty.ai_hint: Name of the input binary field that contains the file to process

url.name: url
url.description: URL of the document or image to process
url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

options.name: options
batch
options.description: Whether to process multiple documents in a single API call (more cost-efficient)

options.name: batchSize
options.description: Maximum number of documents to process in a single batch

options.name: deleteFiles
options.description: Whether to delete the files on Mistral Cloud after processing

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'extractText' THEN SHOW parameter 'model'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'extractText' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentType'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'extractText' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputType'
IF inputType == 'binary' AND resource == 'document' AND operation == 'extractText' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF inputType == 'url' AND resource == 'document' AND operation == 'extractText' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'extractText' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF batch == True THEN SHOW parameter 'batchSize'
IF batch == True THEN SHOW parameter 'deleteFiles'
